text:
Mu gihugu cya Veridiana, higeze kuba federasiyo y’imikino yari imaze kumenyekana cyane kubera iterambere ry’amarushanwa n’amahugurwa yari imaze gutanga mu myaka yashize. Iyo federasiyo yari ikomeye aho yashyigikiraga imikino itandukanye harimo umupira w’amaguru, gusiganwa ku magare, umukino w’intoki, n’indi myinshi.

Icyakora, umunsi umwe, inkuru idasanzwe yatangaje igihugu cyose ndetse n’isi muri rusange, ubwo abakunzi b’imikino bamenyeshwaga ko federasiyo y’imikino yose mu gihugu cya Veridiana yeguye icyarimwe, ibintu byabaye nk’inzozi ku banyarwanda b'icyo gihugu no hanze yacyo.

Impamvu nyinshi zatanzwe ngo zasobanura icyo cyemezo, ariko hari eshatu zifatwa nk’izidasanzwe kandi ziteye amatsiko:

1. **Ingaruka z’ibidukikije**: Byavuzwe ko amahinduzi y’ikirere, ibiza n’amapfa byari byarakajije umurego mu gihe cy’ubuyobozi bw’iyo federasiyo, byari byaratumye imyitozo n’amarushanwa ngombwa adashobora gukomeza uko bisanzwe. Abayobozi ba federasiyo batunguwe no gusanga ibikorwa byose bikomeje guhagarika byinshi mu byari byateguwe kubera amavuta y’ingufu z’imikorere zigomba kujyanwa mu gufasha abatari bake bari barasenyukiwe n’ibiza.

2. **Inyuguti zo mu miterere idasanzwe**: Hari havuzwe ko ahantu federasiyo yakoreraga haketsweho kuba harabayeho ibikorwa by’inyuguti zo mu miterere (imeze nk’ubutaka buri hejuru y’ikindi) zakoraga mu buryo budasanzwe, bigatuma abakozi batabasha kwibanda ku mirimo yabo kubera guhungabanywa n’imbaraga za nyaburanga zagaragaraga muri iyo nyubako. Abahanga muri siyansi bari batangiye kwiga uwo mwihariko ariko wasaga nk’utumvikana, bityo hagafatwa umwanzuro w'uko batava aho hantu ku neza yabo bwite.

3. **Iyobokamana n’ukwizera**: Impamvu ya nyuma yamaze igihe ivugwa, ni uko haje kuvugwa amakuru y’uko icyizere cya federasiyo yari ifite cyari cyarahungabanyijwe n’ibyo benshi bafataga nk’ibiyoka, igihe byageze ubwo abantu biyemeza kuzajya bakurikirara mu makarita y’ubuhanuzi yabaga atangazwa n’abayobozi babo basanzwe mu idini, bavuga ko ibikorwa byo muri federasiyo byari bifitanye isano n’akaga kagenda kaza buri gihe. Bityo, amahitamo yabo yari gufata inzira yo kwegura, hagamijwe kugana mu mirimo mishya yisumbuye ku y’ubuyobozi bwa siporo.

Mu gihe iyi nkuru yavugwaga mu bitangazamakuru bitandukanye, bamwe bayifataga nk’impuha, abandi bagatekereza ko ari uburyo abaturage b’icyo gihugu bashakaga guhindura uburyo bagiraga imiyoborere y’imikino yabo. Hari n’abashimye icyo cyemezo, bavuga ko byerekanye uburyo abayobozi bashobora gushyira imbere ibikorwa bisubiza iby’ukuri icyubahiro cy’abo bari bo ndetse n’icyo bashinzwe. 

Aha ni ho umugoroba wira mu gihugu cya Veridiana, amahanga akoma urusaku rw’icyemezo gitangaje, hagataho amatsiko, amusubirizo, na serwakira y’ibitekerezo bitandukanye itazigera irangira imyaka n’imyaka!

Mu gihugu cy’imisozi miremire, ahitwa Karisimbi, habaye igitondo gitangaje ubwo inkuru idasanzwe yakwirakwizaga ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ndetse no mu binyamakuru bitandukanye. Federasiyo yimikino yose, izwiho guhuriza hamwe imikino y’ubwoko bwose, yatangaje ko yeguye ku mirimo yayo yaba abacungamari, abayobozi ndetse n’abakozi bose. Ibi byabaye nyuma y’ibikorwa byiswe “Umunsi w’ibimenyetso bidasanzwe”.

Mu ntangiriro z’icyumweru, ibintu byahindutse ku buryo budasanzwe ubwo abantu batangiye kubona ibyapa byahinduwe mu nzira zigana ku kibuga cy’imikino, byerekana amerekezo mashya akajya ahitwa mu “Mugongo wa Rukundo”. Abantu benshi baketse ko ari umukino mushya cyangwa igikorwa cyo kwamamaza, ariko ubwo bwari ikimenyetso cya mbere.

Nyuma y’iyo mpinduka mu bimenyetso, abakinnyi batangiye kwibwiriza byinshi bidasanzwe: imvura y’amabuye yacanye ku bibuga by’umupira w’amaguru, inzuzi zishyushye zishoka mu migezi ihanamye ahabera isiganwa ku magare, ndetse hari no kurusha bihuha ko hari igitero cy’inyoni zazengurukaga ibibuga by'umukino, ibyatumaga n’abanyeshuri bafite izo nyamaswa mu mibereho yabo bitabira.

Ibitangazamakuru byafashe umwanzuro wo gushaka igisobanuro cya byo, maze bihishura ko ibyo byose bifitanye isano n’umwuzure w’ibitekerezo by’ubuhanuzi bwakozwe mu myaka amagana ashize n’umuhanuzi witwaga Karisimbi, mu gitabo cye kitwa “Imikino y’Intangiriro”.

Icyatunguye abantu benshi ni uburyo icyo gitabo cyasobanuye neza ibibazo byari bigiye kuba umugabo umwe wizera ibintu byaranze imico y’imikino mu binyejana byinshi bishize. Mu buhanuzi bwe, yahanuye ko aho iterambere ry’imikino rigereye, hari igihe kizagera hakabaho gikomeye, aho umuco w’imikino uzahuzwa na gahunda nshya yo kwishyure ibimenyetso by’ihembe ibyari bitasobanutse.

Mu mwiherero ukomeye w’abayobozi b’amikino harumvikanye urujijo, amarira n’agahinda. Bamwe bashinzwe kwamamaza uko imikino irangwa n’ubuziranenge n’indererwamo z’ubumwe barabivuganye n’indi mitwe y’ubucuruzi yari yararushijwe imbaraga, maze bemeza ko igihe kigeze ngo begure, kubera umugisha ukomeye, ko igikorwa cy’abatari bake kibakurikirana mu bwigenge bushya no mu kubaka ejo hazaza hashya h’imikino ivuguruye.

Abafana ndetse n’abakunzi b’imikino ya Karisimbi, nubwo batunguwe n’ibyabaye, biyemeje kurushaho guharanira guteza imbere uyu muco wabo bihitamo gukorana n’abasimbura babo bahamije kwitangira guhindura iyi nzira ya Odyse mu ntumbero nziza n'icyubahiro. Uyu ni wo mwuka watumye habaho ikiruhuko cyemeza ko mu mahitamo mashya, iterambere rishya rirushaho gutumbagira kurushaho.

Mu gihe isi yakomeje gutera imbere mu bijyanye n’imikino, federasiyo zitandukanye zagiye zibona imbogamizi zitandukanye. Icyakora, mu mwaka wa 2025, ibintu byafashe indi ntera ku buryo budasanzwe, ubwo impamvu zidasanzwe zatuma amafederasiyo y’imikino yose ku isi yegura icyarimwe. Iyi nkuru irasesengura izo mpamvu zidasanzwe zari zimaze igihe ziremerera isi y’imikino, zirimo ibyiza n'ibibi.

Mu ntangiriro za 2025, haje kuvumburwa ko hari ikoranabuhanga rishya ry’umurengezo ryashoboraga gusuzuma imikino, rigatanga ibyavuye mu mukino bififitse. Iri koranabuhanga ryari rifite ubushobozi bwo kunyereza amakuru yose ajyanye n’imikino ndetse no kuyahindura, bikarangira abamaze igihe bitwa abatsinze batsinzwe, naho abitwaga abatsinzwe batsinze. Abakinnyi n’amakipe bari barubatse amazina yabo bashingiye ku mbaraga n’umuhate by’ukuri, byagaragaye ko babeshyaga, nyuma y'ikoranabuhanga ryari ryaragurishijwe rwihishwa ku bagize komite nshinzwe imirimo ya tekinike muri federasiyo zitandukanye.

Ibyo byakuruye umujinya mwinshi mu bakunda siporo n’abakinnyi b'inyangamugayo ku isi hose. Ibikorwa byo kwamagana byatangiye kumvikana mu mijyi ikomeye ku isi, kubera ko abafana batashoboraga kwemera ko ibyo bahoraga bemera nk’ukuri ari ibinyoma. Amashusho y’imikino yatangiye gusesengurwa bushyashya, bigaragara ko imyanzuro myinshi yafashwe ku makipe n’abakinnyi mu bihe byashize yari yarakozwe nabi ku bushake.

Ikibabaje kurushaho, inama z’iburabuza z'abayobora za federasiyo zari zibizi ariko zikicecekera kugira ngo zakomeze kungukira muri ubwo buryo bwa ruswa. Ibyo byavuzwe ko byaterwaga n’umuvundo w’ubukungu ndetse n’umwuka mubi w’inyungu zari zashyizwe imbere kurusha ubushishozi no kuba inyangamugayo.

Ubuyobozi bw’amafederasiyo bwose, kuva ku rwego rw'ingimbi kugeza ku mpuzamashyirahamwe mpuzamahanga, byabaye ngombwa ko bwitaba urukiko. Bahise begura ku mwanya bari bafite nyuma yo gusabwa n'imbaga nyamwinshi guharira abandi bahanga bafite ibitekerezo bishya n’imyitwarire ihamye.

Abakunzi b’imikino batangiye gutekereza ku buryo bushya bwo kuyobora siporo, hibandwa ku guha amahirwe abakiri bato b’inyangamugayo bafite ubushobozi bwo guhanga ibishya mu gucunga amakuru y'ibikomerezwa by’imikino. Ibi byaradutse hakoreshwa uburyo buhanitse bwa "blockchain" kugira ngo amakuru yose y’imikino azakorweho ubushishozi, bityo umupira w’amaguru, basketball, tennis, n’indi mikino yose izongere guhabwa icyubahiro gikwiye.

Iyi mpinduka yabaye icyitegererezo ku isi yose, kuko abari bayoboye ibyo bigo by’imikino byahaye urugero rukomeye mu nzira yo kwigobotora ibitagenda mu mikorere y'ubunyangamugayo n’imikorere idahwitse. Ni urugero rwiza rwerekana ko igihe cyose abari ku ruhande rw’ubutabera n’ubwisanzure bahagurukira icyiza, nta kibi kitagira igisubizo.

Mu gihugu cya Kandala, higeze kuba inkuru itangaje kandi ishimishije mu mateka y'imikino. Mu mpera z'umwaka ushize, igihugu cyamenyekanye hirya no hino ku isi kubera umwanzuro w'igitangaza wafashwe na federasiyo y'imikino yose mu gihugu hose. Uwo mwanzuro wari uko abayobozi b'amafederasiyo yose y'imikino beguye icyarimwe ku mpamvu abaturage badasanzwe basoma kenshi. 

Impamvu nyamukuru zatanzwe zari ziturutse ku gikorwa cyihariye kimaze iminsi gihwihwiswa mu muryango w'imikino. Byatangajwe ko ubwo ikirere cy'icyo gihugu cyadeedukaga amahindura atari yarigeze aboneka mu buzima bwa muntu, abantu batangiye kubona ibintu bitangaje byiyereka mu kirere. Byari ibyaremwe mu ishusho y'ibimenyetso by'imikino n'ubutumwa bwanditse mu majwi atumvikana neza ariko afitanye isano n'imihigo n'umwuka w'imikorere y'imikino ihamye.

Abahanga mu by'ikirere n'abakuru mu by'umuco gakondo bishyize hamwe basanga ayo majwi ari ubutumwa buvuye mu gihe cyo hambere, ubwo abantu bagikoresha uburyo bw'ubuhanzi n'ikoranabuhanga bashushanyije bakanandika ku bivuzo. Batsinze urujijo batangaza ko ubwo butumwa bwari bugamije guhindura imitekerereze n'imikorere mu mikino, bikongera gusubizaho imikorere yubakiye ku ndangagaciro z'umurava, ubutwari, n'ubunyangamugayo bwibagiranye mu myaka myinshi ishize.

Ku bw'izo mpamvu, abagize za federasiyo bafashe icyemezo cyo gutanga imihoho kugira ngo habeho kuruhuka no kwiga uko basubizaho izo ndangagaciro zaje ziturutse mu kirere. Bemera ko ari ngombwa kuba intangiriro yo gusigasira uwo murage wiza, bakemera gukosora inenge yari yarabayeho mu mikorere yabo kubera iterambere ridashingiye ku muco rwose. Ubu bwiru bwamwitwaga "Ubutumwa Bw'Isi Nshya," bwabaye icyitegererezo mu bihugu bitandukanye, byatumya hafi ya byose bihindura imikorere kugira ngo birangwe n’ukuri, igikundiro, n'ubusabane.

Kubera iyi mpamvu yihariye kandi idasanzwe, abaturage ba Kandala bashyigikiye byimazeyo icyemezo cya federasiyo, maze babona uburyo bwo kongera kwita ku bikorwa byimikinire bibanziriza amateka y'imihigo n'ubuhanga bwa muntu. Ni inkuru itazibagirana imaze guhindura isura y'imikino mu gihugu, ndetse ikaba intangiriro yo gukangurira isi yose gukorera hamwe mu bumwe n'ishyaka ridatezuka.

Mu gihugu cy'imisozi n'ibibaya, cyuzuye imijyi itoshye n'imijishi, havugwaga inkuru idasanzwe itarigeze yumvwa mu mateka y'umupira w'amaguru. Abaturage n’abakunzi b'imikino bari mu bwigunge, abandi bafite amatsiko, nyuma y'amakuru yakwirakwiye avuga ko Komite Nyobozi y'Imikino muri icyo gihugu 'Federasiyo y'Imikino Yose' yeguye mu buryo butunguranye.

Iyi nkuru y’ibyabaye itangira mu buryo budasanzwe, ubwo mu ma saa moya z'umugoroba umwe, itangazo ridasanzwe ryasohokaga kuri radiyo y’igihugu n'incamake zamatangazo ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, umunyamabanga mukuru wa fedarasi atangaza ko byari amahitamo adasubirwaho kubwo 'impamvu zitasanzwe'. Nyuma yo kumva ayo magambo, abantu bibajije byinshi, bakwira imishwaro, abandi bagwa mu rujijo.

Umunsi ukurikiyeho, abakozi ba federasiyo batangiye gutangaza amwe mu mayeri n'amasakindi yabaye inyuma y’ibi byose. Bavuze ko, mu by’ukuri, habayeho ibintu byinshi byashakaga gukomishwa no kwerekanwa akari mu nda y'ihene ku bijyanye na ruswa, imikino yarangwaga no kunyurwa n’amarozi, n'ihakwa ry’ubushobozi bw’abakinnyi biturutse ku bayobozi bashatse kugera ku mbata mu buryo butajyanye n’ubumenyi n’ubushobozi bafite mu kibuga.

Ariko, icyatangaje cyane, ni uko bamwe mu bakinnyi n’abatoza baje gutanga ubuhamya bwerekana ko hari indi mpamvu yo mu mwuka itari yarigeze yemerwa; bemeje ko ibintu bari barerekanwa mu byerekwa, aho babonaga imikino igenzurwa n’imbaraga zidasanzwe. Harimo ubushiti n’amashyano byarashwe ku makipe ngo atazakora neza, n'uburiganya bwakozwe mu ibanga ry'ijoro ku mazi n’icyaka by'abakinnyi, byose mu rwego rwo gushinga umuzi wa “nzaratsi” ku bakinnyi b'abahanga kugira ngo batsindwe ku minsi ikomeye.

Izi mpamvu zishyize imbere ibyari bisanzwe bizwi nko guhamya icyerekezo cy’imikino y’igisekuru kidafite urufatiro. Mu itangazamakuru, hutazwaga amasaha n’amasaha ikipe ihangana mu biseseme by'ubuyanja, imitwe yombi inengwa kwiyemera uruhande rw’imvuzo aho guharanira umugisha n’ejo hazaza heza.

Bikomeje gutya, abantu basabwe kujya mu bukangurambaga bw’impinduramatwara mu mikino, aho urukundo rwabo rutazaba rw’ikinyoma, ahubwo ruzagenderwa na karanijisho k’impu mu bwenge n’amategeko afatika. Igihugu cyose cyahagurukiye igihe kimwe, kugira ngo bagarure icyizere ndetse bemeze ko umunsi w'imikino, aho ubunyangamugayo n'umurava uziranenge, ugaruke mu kibuga n’aho utatsindwa. 

Ibyo birego byose byatanze umwanya wo gucukurira umuzi w’amariganya n’ibirori bya magendo. Mu buryo bwihuse, abashinzwe iperereza b'igihugu batangiye gukurikirana buri cyemezo cya federasiyo, banaha ikizere abafana ko nta gushidikanya buri kosa rizasubizwamo uburyo nahe. Mu mibereho mishya n’ishyirahamwe rishya ry’abanyakanini ryashinzwe, hagamijwe gusigasira umurage usukuye w’umupira w'amaguru n'imikino yose mu gihugu ukundi mu buryo bufatika, butarangwamo umwijima.

Mu gihugu cy'imisozi igihumbi, hari inkuru idasanzwe yahuruje abatuye isi yose. Umunsi umwe rwose, inkuru y'ikimwaro yamenyekanye ko ishyirahamwe ry'imikino yose mu gihugu ryari rimaze kwegura icyarimwe. Ibi byabaye inkuru y'igitangaza ku buryo n'ibitangazamakuru mpuzamahanga byatangiye gutara iyo nkuru ku buryo bucukumbuye.

Ubusanzwe, iryo shyirahamwe ry’imikino ryari rifite izina rikomeye mu guteza imbere siporo mu gihugu. Ryari rifite inshingano zo kuyobora imikino itandukanye, kuva ku mukino w'intoki kugeza ku masiganwa yo gusiganwa ku magare. Abari bayoboye iryo shyirahamwe bari abantu bazwiho ubuhanga n'ubudahemuka mu byo bakora, nyamara rero, icyemezo cyabo cyo kwegura byaravugishije benshi.

Ibyabaye byose byatangiye igihe kirengero kidafite isobanuro cyabaye ku mupira w'amaguru wa nyuma y'amajonjora y'igikombe cy'isi. Umukino wari utegerejwe n'abatari bake mu gihugu hose. Ariko nyuma y'imyitozo ya nyuma, umupira w'imikino warekuye ururabo rw'amashanyarazi maze ukaba umushonga wicyuma gitangaje cyaje kumenyekana ko cyari gifite ubushobozi bwo gutwara ingufu z'abari mu kibuga no mu ntebe z'abafana! Iyo nkuru yamamaye vuba, abantu benshi batangazwa n'ubwo bwoba butatse isura z'abakinnyi ku kibuga.

Iyi nkuru yabaye imbarutso yo kwibaza ku mpamvu z'icyo kibazo. Amacenga y'ubucuzi atwawe na tekinoloji idasanzwe yari yabaye ku rusimbi rw'amarushanwa. Biravugwa ko hari abakire bake bageragezaga gukoresha ibikorwa by'imikino mu nyungu zabo, bifashishije ubwo buryo bw'ikirenga bwo kumenya no kugenzura imbaraga n'ubushobozi bw'abakinnyi.

Iyi mpamvu ikimara kumenyekana, abayobozi b'ishyirahamwe baje kumva ko badashobora kwirengera umutwaro w'amacakubiri yari kubaho mu gihugu, kandi banga kuba igitwikirizo cy'icyo gikorwa cyaseswa ku buryo bugayitse. Mu majwi yabo yavugirijwe mu nama idasanzwe, bavuze ko bahisemo kwegura ngo bategure inzira y'ubutabera no guha urubyiruko rw'ejo hazaza amahirwe yo kuvugurura buri kimwe mu mwuka mwiza no mu mucyo. Bavuze kandi ko bashakaga gutuma hamenyekana abanyabyaha nk'abiyemeje kwangiza intego n’indangagaciro za siporo.

Iyi nkuru yavuze amagambo akomeye mu gihugu cy'imisozi igihumbi, iboneraho umwanya wo guhindura byinshi mu mico n'imyemerere ya siporo. Kuva icyo gihe, hahise hatangira umushinga wo gusuzuma no guhindura byimbitse imiyoborere y'imikino yose, bigamije kugarura ikizere n’ubusugire muri siporo. Ku rundi ruhande, amashyirahamwe mpuzamahanga nayo yizeraga ko iyi nkuru kugeza ubu nta kindi cyari kimeze nk'iyo, ibyo bituma bigira isomo ku buryo buhinyurwa no gukosorwa kugira ngo habeho ituze mu mikino y'isi yose.

Inkuru Ndende: Impamvu Zidasanzwe Zatumye Federasiyo y’Imikino Yose Yegura

Mu gitondo cyo kuwa mbere, abantu benshi bakangutse babonye inkuru idasanzwe yanze mu binyamakuru no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga: Federasiyo y'Imikino yose ku rwego rw’igihugu yamenyesheje ko yeguye ku mirimo yayo, iyi nkuru ikaba yabaye nk’inkuba yakubise umuturirwa. Ibintu byasaga nk’ibitangaza kuko nta we wari witeze icyemezo kidasanzwe nk’iki, cyanatumye benshi bibaza icyihishe inyuma y’uku kwegura kwa rusange.

Bamwe mubayobozi ba federasiyo bagaragaje ko icyemezo cyo kwegura cyashingiye ku mpamvu zidasanzwe, zirimo ibyago bikurikiranye n'ibikorwa bidasanzwe byigeze kugaragara mu marushanwa y'imikino. Ubuyobozi bwavuze ko umwaka ushize bwahekuwe n'urugomo rwakwirakwiye mu mikino itandukanye, aho abakinnyi n’abafana bagiye bakora ibikorwa bibi cyane byiyambura ikuzo n’ishema imikino yagakoze.

Ikindi cyateye kwegura kwabo ni uko mu migi myinshi yabereyemo amarushanwa, hakomeje kugaragara ibikorwa by'ubujura byibasira ibyuma by’ikoranabuhanga n’ibikoresho by'ikoranabuhanga rikoreshwa mu marushanwa, ibintu byomeje guteza igihombo kidasanzwe muri za federasiyo zose. Ubuyobozi bwafashe icyemezo cyo kwegura kugira ngo hatangire hashakwe uburyo bushya bwo gukemura ibi bibazo byugarije imikino.

Hari kandi ikibazo cy’ikibazo gikomeye kijyanye n’imihindagurikire y’ibihe. Mu mikino myinshi, byagaragaye ko abakinnyi babangamirwa n’imihindagurikire y’ikirere, aho ubushyuhe budasanzwe bwakomeje guteza ibibazo ku mikino yo hanze. Ibi byatumye abayobozi bumva ko igihe kigeze ngo habe impinduka zifatika harimo no kureka ibintu bishya bihangika hagati.

Ikindi cyatangaje benshi ni amakuru yavuzwe ko hari n’ibintu by’akataraboneka byagiye bigaragara mu kibuga. Amakuru y’impamo avuga ko mu marushanwa atandukanye, ibikoresho bimwe na bimwe by’imikino byagiye bibonwa ko bifite imikorere itangaje byonyine! Nko mu mukino w’intoki waberaga mu mujyi mukuru, byavuzwe ko umupira wabonywe utembera mu kibuga nta muntu uwukoraho ubwo umukino wari wahagaze by’akanya gato. Ibi bintu byatumye benshi bibaza niba hari ibirenze uko ibintu byagaragaraga.

Biravugwa kandi ko hari n’ikibazo cy’umuco, aho bamwe mubayobozi basanza bagiye bavumbura ko muri federasiyo harimo ibinda abantu badakurikiza izindi gahunda zigenga imikino, bikaba byaratezaga umwuka mubi w’akazi. Abo bayobozi, mu kwerekana ko bashaka impinduka, bahisemo gusezerera bakava mu myanya bari barimo.

Mu gukemura iyi myitwarire yose, haravugwa ko hashobora kuba hagiye gutangazwa urwego rwisumbuyeho rushinzwe kugenzura no gukurikirana imikorere igezweho mu mikino, bigatuma imikino imenyesha no kubona insangabitekerezo nshya zatuma iterambere rirushaho kugerwaho ku buryo bwifuzwa.

Ihuriro ry’amashyirahamwe yimikino ryatangaje ko rigiye kubanza kuganira uburyo bw’ingamba nshya zirimo gukemura imvune no kureba ikoranabuhanga rishya ryazavumburwa mu buryo butabogamye. Hari inama igomba gutegurwa kugira ngo habeho uburyo bwo gukomeza ibikorwa no kongera guteza imbere ibikorwa by’imikino.

Iyo ni inkuru iteye inkeke ariko yanateye benshi ubwoba. Haracyasigaye byinshi byo kubaho ngo ibintu bisubire mu buryo. Iyi ni imwe mu nkuru zizibukwa cyane mu mateka y’imikino mu gihugu, kandi izasiga isomo rikomeye ku buryo imikino igomba kurindwa no gutegurwa mu buryo bwizewe kandi bunoze.

Mu gihugu cya Nyiributungane, habaye impinduka itunguranye ndetse idasanzwe mu mateka y’imikino yose ya hano ku isi. Ku wa mbere w’icyumweru gishize, abatuye iki gihugu basanze ibinyamakuru bihinda umunyenga nk’ibimeze mu ntambara, impamvu y’iyi nkubiri ikaba ari icyemezo kitigeze kibaho mbere: federasiyo y’imikino yose mu gihugu yahisemo kwegura mu buryo butunguranye. Impamvu nyamukuru z’iki cyemezo zikomeje guteza urujijo n’ubwoba mu bitabiriye ibiganiro mbwirwaruhame hirya no hino.

Hari inkuru zagiye hanze zivuga ko imwe mu mpamvu zateje aka kaduruvayo ari ugucengera kwa tekinoloji ya siyansi mu mikino, aho ubuhanga bwa siyansi buhanitse bwari bugamije gufasha abakinnyi gukina neza, bwaje gukererezwa n’impaka nyinshi mu bijyanye n’amategeko abigenga. Abayobozi ba za federasiyo babonye ko iki kibazo gikomeje gufata intera, kandi ko kutagikemura byari gutuma igihugu kiba insina ngufi mu ruhando mpuzamahanga rw’amarushanwa menshi ategurwa. Nyamara kandi, ikibazo cyari cyigoye kubona igisubizo gifatika kubera inyungu za politiki z’abifuza gufata ayo mahirwe mu buryo bwihishe.

Indi mpamvu idasanzwe yatumye begura ni ugutandukana n’ukwemera gukorwaho igerageza ryo gukoresha abakinnyi bashya barimo robots mu mikino, igitekerezo cyari cyatewe inkunga n’ibigo bibiri bikomeye by’ikoranabuhanga ku isi. Byagaragaye ko byari gutuma imikino idasanzwe, ariko kandi ikuraho wa mwimerere w’umuntu mu mikino n’amarushanwa. Ibi byateye impagarara hagati y’abayobozi, bamwe bari baganisha ku guharanira iterambere mu gihe abandi bashishikajwe no kurengera amahame ndangagaciro y’umuco w’imikino gakondo.

Ikindi giciko kidasanzwe cyateye iyi mpinduka ni amakimbirane yavutse ku bijanye n’ubusumbane mu isaranganya ry’ibya mfura rubanda, aho ibihugu bituriye Nyiributungane byari byaratangiye kotsa igitutu iyi federasiyo ngo itangire kuyabafasha mu nzira z'ubufatanye. Ibi byaje no gutizwa umurindi n'ikibazo cy'ubushobozi buke bwari butarizewe ko buryoze guhemba abatoza n’abakinnyi bafite amazina akomeye.

Mu gihe abasirimu n’abakurikiranira hafi iby’imikino bakomeje kwibaza amaherezo y’iri vunguka, abaturage basigaye mu rungabangabo, barigengesera ngo barebe urubyiruko rwabo ndetse n’ikibazo cy’ubuzima bw’imikino y’imbere mu gihugu. Haracyategerejwe niba hashobora kuboneka igisubizo cyavugurura izi federasiyo, zigakomera ku murage nyawo w’imikino cyangwa niba amarushanwa azahinduka igikoresho cya tekinoloji mu buryo bwose bushoboka. Ibi byose byatumye ibitangazamakuru birushaho kwibanda kuri iki kibazo, ndetse n’imirongo itandukanye itegereje kumva niba hari inkomoko y’umuti ku bw’iyo mpinduka idasanzwe.

Mu gihugu cya Kalevala, icyemezo cy’ikirenga cyafashwe ku itariki ya 15 Ukwakira 2023, ubwo Federasiyo y’Imikino yose mu gihugu yahitaga yegura ku mirimo yabo ku mpamvu zagaragaye ko zidasanzwe kandi zidasanzwe. Iyi nkuru yabaye kimomo mu bitangazamakuru hirya no hino, ituma abantu benshi bibaza kuri izo mpamvu.

Mu ntangiriro z’iki cyumweru, intumwa za Guverinoma ya Kalevala zari zatangiye iperereza ryimbitse ku mikorere y’iyo federasiyo nyuma y’aho abakinnyi batandukanye batangaje ko hari umwuka utari mwiza mu buyobozi. Nyamara, hari hacicikana inkuru y’uko ibyo birego byari byishingikirije ku mpamvu zifitanye isano n’uburyo umutekano w’abakinnyi warindwaga n’uburyo ibikoresho byabageragaho.

Hagati aho, byaje gutahurwa ko hari ishyirahamwe ridasanzwe ryari ritangiye kwivanga mu mikorere ya federasiyo, bakoresheje uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga ridashobora guhita ritahurwa, aho byavugwaga ko iri shyirahamwe ryari rigamije kuyobya amarangamutima y’abanyakalevala binyuze mu mikino. Abasesenguzi baje gusanga iri shyirahamwe ryarakoreshaga uburyo bwo gupindura ibyavuye mu mikino, bigatuma abakinnyi b’icyo gihugu batabona amahirwe banganyije n’abandi ku rwego mpuzamahanga.

Igikomeye cyaje kuba ubwo haje kugaragara ko hari abanyamakuru bari baracengeye muri Federasiyo nk’abakozi bayo, bashinzwe kugenzura amabombe y’ibitekerezo (brain bombs). Aya mabombe y’ibitekerezo yari afite ubushobozi bwo guhindura uko umuntu atekereza mu gihe gito, bityo bagashobora guhindura imyanzuro ifatwa n’ubuyobozi bwa federasiyo mu buryo buhuye n’inyungu z’irit..

Izi mpamvu zidasanzwe zatumye abayobozi bafata icyemezo cyo kwegura, ngo hererwe amayira neza abashya bashobora guhangana n’izi mbaraga zidasanzwe zari zashimuse ihuriro ry’iterambere rya siporo muri Kalevala. Guverinoma yahise ishyiraho akanama k'inzobere kazakurikirana ibi bikorwa byose maze kazane umurongo mushya w’ubuyobozi bw’imikino mu gihugu.

Abakunzi b’imikino hirya no hino mu gihugu bakomeje kugaragaza impungenge zabo ku hazaza ha siporo ya Kalevala, gusa icyizere cyagarutse ubwo benshi batangazaga ko ko gutahura izo mpamvu bizatuma habaho impinduka nziza mu mitegurire y’imikino no mu migenzo yayo.

Iki cyemezo cyagiyeho cyavoumwe n’ijwi rirenga, kandi ubu harateganywa amahugurwa y’abayobozi b’imikino ku rwego rw’igihugu, hagamijwe kunoza imikoranire no kwirinda icyakongera kubera i Kalevala ingorane nk’izi. Iyi nkuru yateye imyanzuro ihamye, bituma amaso ahora kuri Kalevala ku buryo buzira imbereka bwo gukemura iki kibazo.

Umunsi umwe mu gihugu cya Nyirarubuga, hagaragaye inkuru idasanzwe yatumye isi yose itangara. Mu bitangazamakuru byo hirya no hino, hiriwe havugwa uburyo Federasiyo y’Imikino ya Nyirarubuga, iyobowe n’abarimwe b'abahanga n'inararibonye mu rwego rw'imikino, yeguye mu buryo butunguranye. Byari biteganyijwe ko iyi federasiyo izarangiza amasezerano y'imyaka itanu yari yarahawe, ariko imyanzuro y’aba bayobozi yashenguye uwari uyiteze wese. Incamake y'icyo cyemezo ntabwo iba mu bimenyetso bisanzwe.

Byamenyekanye ko impamvu nyamukuru y'ubwegure bwa federasiyo yari ifite ishingiro ridakanganye. Ni ukubera ko abayobozi bakuru baje gusanga ahantu bagize ingendo zabo z’urugendo ngarukamwaka bashobora kuba bahahuriye n’ibidasanzwe. Mu gihe bari bitabiriye inama y’imikino mpuzamahanga mu mugi wa Muvandimwe, byavuzwe ko bahuye n’ihuriro ry’abahanzi b’udushya, aho bari bagiye kubyina imbyino zidasanzwe no kumva umuvugo mbonekamwe wakoranywe ubuhanga bwa kidasohoka.

Bivugwa ko mu iryo huriro, abanyamuryango ba federasiyo bumvishe umuvugo umutima ushobora gutera guhinduka, wavugaga ku kwiyoroshya, guca bugufi, no kuba indashyikirwa kuruta uko umuntu yakwitekerezaga. Umuvugo wabakoze ku mutima, batajiye kureba kugira indi ntego iyo ari yo yose ahubwo bagatekereza uburyo bushya bwo kurebera ubuzima mu buryo bwagutse. Umuka bavuyemo nyuma y’iryo huriro wabaye ntagereranywa, bituma bumva umurego wo gukora impinduka mu buzima bwabo bwite ndetse no muri siporo zose.

Nyuma y’icyo gikorwa, abayobozi ba federasiyo bafashe umwanya wo gutekereza neza ku ntego nyazo z’ubuzima bwabo, ndetse no ku ruhare rwabo mu guhindura ubuzima bw’abantu binyuze mu mikino. Iki cyari igihe gikwiye cyo gutanga amahirwe ku bandi kugira ngo nabo bagire amahirwe yo gukora icyo gikorwa kihariye. Kubegura kwa federasiyo kwabaye umwanya wo kurekura umwanya, abantu bashya bafite ibitekerezo n’imbaraga zidasanzwe bo gukomeza guteza imbere urwego rw’imikino.

Iki cyemezo kandi cyari gifite undi mumaro wagutse; binyuze mu gusezera ku kazi bari barakundaga, aba bayobozi bahise batangiza umuryango witwa "Intego Nshya", ugamije kuzamura siporo z’abana n’urubyiruko bafite impano zadasanzwe. Ku bw'ibyo, babaye intangarugero ku gihugu ndetse no ku isi muri rusange, aho bashimangiye ko ubuyobozi bushobora kuvamo impinduka nziza igihe cyose bwifuza guharanira icyiza kirambye.

Ni muri ubwo buryo Federasiyo y’imikino ya Nyirarubuga yaciye agahigo, ishimangira ko siporo atari ukugana insinzi gusa, ahubwo ko ishobora no guteza imbere intego z’ubuzima mu buryo bushya kandi butazasibangana. Inkuru yabo yerekanye ko hari ubwo ubuyobozi bwiyemeza gukora ibyagatangaje, kugira ngo bugire uruhare runini mu guhindura imibereho myiza y'abantu bose.
